¿Por qué no quieren al ‘Canelo’?
Presidente del CMB explicó por qué Saúl Álvarez tiene tantos detractores
06 Nov 2019, 02:16 by Redacción
Luego de que Saúl ‘Canelo’ Álvarez consiguiera su cuarto cinturón en categorías diferentes, las comparaciones con otros pugilistas mexicanos no se hicieron esperar, siendo Julio César Chávez el primero que nos viene a la mente; sin embargo hay una gran diferencia, ya que el boxeo del sonorense cautivaba a quien lo veía y convencía a las masas de apoyarlo, pero ese no es el caso del jalisciense, quien tiene muchos detractores. Mauricio Sulaimán, presidente del CMB, dio su teoría sobre por qué el ‘Canelo’ sigue sin convencer a parte de la afición.
“Cuando hay una figura de estos niveles, lo más común es comparar. El estilo de un Julio César Chávez que cautivó a México por ir hacia delante es diferente, ‘Canelo’ era así al principio pero cambió desde su pelea con Mayweather. Su estilo de boxeo no es lo que otros quisieran ver“, comentó Sulaimán en entrevista para W Radio.



“Si no convence después de una demostración como la del sábado, es inexplicable, es increíble que la gente tenga esa adversidad contra él. Entiendo a quienes les gusta que los boxeadores salgan a fajarse, pero también existe el boxeo fino y de estrategia”, justificó al ‘Canelo.
“Está construyendo su legado, todavía está escribiendo su historia, me gusta su compromiso, siempre serás criticado por un sector, ha tenido que remar contracorriente, pero ha demostrado que es un ganador, siempre ha representado a México orgullosamente”, sentenció.

Why don't you want ‘Canelo’?
WBC President explained why Saúl Álvarez has so many detractors
06 Nov 2019, 02:16 by Drafting
After Saúl ‘Canelo’ Álvarez got his fourth belt in different categories, comparisons with other Mexican boxers were swift, with Julio César Chávez being the first that comes to mind; However, there is a big difference, since the Sonoran boxing captivated those who saw it and convinced the masses to support it, but that is not the case of the Jalisco, who has many detractors. Mauricio Sulaimán, president of the CMB, gave his theory about why the ‘Canelo’ is still not convincing part of the fans.
“When there is a figure of these levels, the most common is to compare. The style of a Julio César Chávez who captivated Mexico by going forward is different, ‘Canelo’ was like that at the beginning but changed since his fight with Mayweather. His boxing style is not what others would like to see, ”said Sulaiman in an interview for W Radio.



“If he doesn't convince after a demonstration like Saturday’s, it’s inexplicable, it’s incredible that people have that adversity against him. I understand those who like boxers to go out to fight, but there is also fine and strategic boxing, ”justified‘ Canelo.
“He is building his legacy, he is still writing his story, I like his commitment, you will always be criticized by a sector, he has had to row against the tide, but he has shown that he is a winner, he has always represented Mexico proudly,” he said.
